name: Resurrect Delivery
description:
Welcome to Resurrect Delivery!

You are a RoboGhost Delivery Bot of Underworld Delivery Inc., debuting a brand new product - Life in a Box TM! 

Your job is to go to as many doors as possible and deliver this wonderful product, turning Ghosts into Normal Humans once more. Make sure to run back to your truck once you run out of Boxes!

Underworld Delivery Inc. is a publicly traded company, and its shares must go up! Ensure that the share price of UD Inc. goes up by earning more money in each delivery run than the previous! If you fail to do so, Share Price will go down, and if it reaches 0, that's game over!

Luckily, you can upgrade RoboGhost at the end of each delivery!

Controls:

A/D or Left Arrow-Right Arrow - Move Left or Right

W/Up Arrow - Jump

G - Pause the game

If you liked this and are interested in another platformer by me, check out Treasure Climb!

___
